alphaNumeric: The {field} field may only contain alpha-numeric characters.
alpha: The {field} field  {field} may only contain alphabetic characters.
between: The {field} field must be between {min} and {max}.
email: The {field} field must be a valid email address.
max: The {field} field may not be greater than {max}.
min: The {field} field must be at least {min}.
numeric: The {field} field must be a number.
url: The {field} field must be a valid URL.
youtube: The {field} field must be a valid YouTube URL.
